The new gold standard in hair straightening and restoration has arrived at Luxe: Nanoplasty Hair Straightening Treatment. This innovative, improved Straightening Technology is intended to replace Keratin systems and Permanent Japanese Straighteners, which can be dangerous for both clients and stylists due to the usage of harsh chemicals and damaging to the hair due to the permanent breakdown of the hair structure. Hair is immediately straightened and restored, giving long-lasting straight hair.

Key Benefits of Nanoplasty Hair Straightening

  • Long lasting, straight hair for up to 8 months
  • Impactful shine and gloss effect
  • Eliminates 100% of frizz
  • Deeply hydrates and treats hair while restoring fibre from the inside out

How Does Nanoplasty Hair Straightening Work?

Nanoplasty is a revolutionary technology that utilises Nanoparticles in tandem with Intracellular Nutrition to straighten hair without compromising the integrity of the hair. Compared with traditional keratin systems, Nanoparticles contained in the treatment are approximately 750x smaller, allowing the nutrients to penetrate deeper into the hair fibre and treat the hair without opening the cuticle. Therefore, disregarding the need for an anti-residue shampoo, making it a fast & effective one-step system.

Floractive’s formula contains Essential Organic Acids + Hydrolysed Vegetable Keratin that includes the innovative Ozone Protein, Coconut Oil, Olive Oil, Linseed Oil, Ascorbic Acid, Acetic Acid and Lactic Acid. This revolutionary blend of ingredients increases hydration and assists in reconstructing the hair fibre while promoting hair growth without causing damage to the hair fibre.

What Is Difference Between Nanoplasty and Traditional Keratin Treatments?

The main distinction between Keratin and Nanoplasty is the chemical composition of each treatment. Whilst the Keratin treatments we offer at Luxe do not contain Formaldehyde or other harsh chemicals, the Nanoplasty is less toxic as it is formulated with organic acids and collagen. It is free of harsh chemicals, formaldehyde releasers, carboncysteine, and other pollutants.

Additionally, unlike traditional Keratin Treatments, Nanoplasty lasts in the hair for up 8 months, as opposed to three tp six month results with older technologies. After having a Nanoplasty service, the treatment will grow out of the hair, rather than fade out. 

Nanoplasty eliminates 100% of any frizz you may have had prior to the service and you will be able to wash and wear your hair straight and shiny with no to minimal heat styling. In addition to straightening the hair, the treatment repairs the hair from the inside out. It is produced with Organic Acids, Açai, and Linseed Oil, all of which are vegan and natural.

Nanoplasty Hair Straightening FAQ’s

Q: How long does it last?
A: Nanoplasty lasts 6-8 months on the hair. Everyone’s hair is different, with some hair types more resistant than others

Q: Will Nanoplasty straighten curly hair?
A: Most definitely – the treatment can be used on all hair textures, coloured and highlighted hair. 

Q: How soon can I colour my hair after having Nanoplasty?
A: Colour is safe to do the day after the treatment. As the treatment may strip artificial colour from your hair, we suggest in timing your treatment visit close to when you are next due for colour. 

Q: Is there any down time after treatment?
A: No – once the treatment is complete in salon, it is safe to wash your hair, tie it up or exercise as soon as you please. If you are swimming in salt or chlorinated, we suggest in waiting a few days before doing so after having the treatment.

Q: How do I care for my Nanoplasty at home?
A: It is strongly recommended to use Sulphate-Free home care products for long-lasting results.

Q: How long will I be in the Salon?
A: You will typically be in the salon for 3-3.5 hours, depending on the length and thickness of your hair

All bookings, consultations and general enquiries can be arranged either by phone, online or with the Luxe staff in the salon.
